allow: Bash(pnpm add vue-router@4 pinia element-plus axios markdown-it highlight.js)
Bash(PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" uv run python -c "from langchain_core.messages import ToolCallChunk; print\(ToolCallChunk.__fields__\)")

Bash(PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" uv run python -c "
from langchain_core.messages import ToolCallChunk
import inspect
print\(inspect.signature\(ToolCallChunk\)\)
tc = ToolCallChunk\(name=''test'', args=''{""a"":1}'', id=''tc-1'', index=0\)
print\(tc\)
")

Bash(PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" uv run python -c "
from langchain_core.messages import ToolCallChunk
tc = ToolCallChunk\(name=''test'', args=''{""a"":1}'', id=''tc-1'', index=0\)
print\(type\(tc\), tc\)
")

Bash(PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" uv run python -c "
from langchain_core.messages import ToolCallChunk
tc = ToolCallChunk\(name=''test'', args=''{""a"":1}'', id=''tc-1'', index=0\)
print\(''hasattr index:'', hasattr\(tc, ''index''\)\)
print\(''tc.index:'', tc.get\(''index''\)\)
print\(''type:'', type\(tc\)\)
# It''s a dict, so hasattr won''t work for dict keys
print\(''hasattr name:'', hasattr\(tc, ''name''\)\)
")
